Description: Two sherds (one made up of two joining fragments) of East Greek pottery krater rim with trace of handle attachment; much worn; inside glazed with added red band; top of rim glazed, at least in part; frieze of rectangles on outside of rim; underside and wall glazed save in handle zone; incised inscription on top of rim.
Bibliographic references: Gardner 1888 / Naukratis II (p. 65, no. 783, pl. XXI, no. 783)
Bernand 1970 / Le Delta égyptien d'après les textes grecs, i: les confins libyques (p. 685, no. 434)
Villing et al 2013-2015 / Naukratis: Greeks in Egypt (GO.357)
